com.magknight.mathutils

Class Circle2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.magknight.mathutils.Circle2D

  • public class Circle2D
extends java.lang.Object
    Circle2D implements a basic circle class with useful operations regularly used in path generation.
    Since:
    5/19/2020
    Author:
    Cian Mc Sweeney and Omar Alam

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Circle2D(Vector2 center, double radius)
      Initializes a circle with center pointer and radius

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Vector2

      • getPointAngle

        public double getPointAngle(Vector2 point)
        Parameters:
        point -
        Returns:
        The angle to the circle center from the point on the circle

      • lineSphereIntersection

        public static Vector2[] lineSphereIntersection(Line2D line,
                                               Circle2D circle,
                                               boolean forceSolution)
        Finds any intersections that exist between a line and a given sphere
        Parameters:
        line - line to perform intersection with
        circle - circle to perform intersection with
        forceSolution - forceSolution tries to find the closest to the line if no intersection is present
        Returns:
        Vector2[] intersections if any. Empty array otherwise.

      • circleIntersection

        public static Vector2[] circleIntersection(Circle2D circle1,
                                           Circle2D circle2)
        Performs a circle - circle intersection algorithm.
        Parameters:
        circle1 - first circle to intersect
        circle2 - second circle to intersect
        Returns:
        Vector2[] returns an array with 1 or 2 Vector2 objects depending on the intersection type.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the circles do not intersect.

      • getPointCircleTangentPoints

        public Vector2[] getPointCircleTangentPoints(Vector2 point)
        Tries to find a connection between a point outside the circle, and the circle itself through tangent lines. Algorithm documented at: https://mathbitsnotebook.com/Geometry/Constructions/CCconstructionCircles.html
        Parameters:
        point - The point to find tangent connection to.
        Returns:
        Vector2[] Will always return a Vector2 array with 2 points.

      • getClockwiseAngleBetweenPointsOnCircle

        public double getClockwiseAngleBetweenPointsOnCircle(Vector2 point1,
                                                     Vector2 point2)
        Calculates clockwise angle between 2 points on the circle
        Parameters:
        point1 - First point on circle
        point2 - Second point on circle
        Returns:
        double clockwise angle on circle (Most likely negative).

      • getAngleBetweenPointsOnCircle

        public double getAngleBetweenPointsOnCircle(Vector2 point1,
                                            Vector2 point2)
        Calculates the anti-clockwise angle between 2 points on the circle
        Parameters:
        point1 - First point on circle
        point2 - Second point on circle
        Returns:
        double anti-clockwise angle on circle.

      • doCirclesIntersect

        public boolean doCirclesIntersect(Circle2D otherCircle)
        Using the squared distance algorithm to check if circles intersect.
        Parameters:
        otherCircle - circle to check intersections with
        Returns:
        true if circles intersect at any point, false otherwise

      • getCenter

        public Vector2 getCenter()
        Returns:
        Vector2 center point of the circle
